1.0.name: wordpress/a-to-z-category-navigation-widget
1.0.description:
This Widget will show A-to-Z listing of all the categories and its subcategories in alphabetical order. Use CSS style to decorate your page.

You can adjust the width for the navigation from admin section. From admin settings You also can exclude some of the top level categories form the category listing.

Try the Demo

If you're interested in seeing what a default installation of A to Z Category Navigation Widget has to offer, try out the test drive first!

A to Z Category Navigation Widget Test Drive

Where can I get support?

Whether you're reporting a bug, requesting a new feature, or just wanting to make a comment, I will be happy to hear from you. The support forums can be found here or visit our
